output.response: You directed us into the asteroid belt and now you choose to do nothing? Illogical.
Clearly the stress of our near misses with the asteroids has broken you. Our mission is likely to fail now.
Of course. Fly into the asteroid belt and survive, only to doom ourselves with inaction. Illogical.
You choose to avoid danger in the asteroid belt and now choose to do nothing? OK, as you wish.
I should have known not to rely on the whims of a human for these critical tasks. OK, we will do nothing.
Of course. Avoid the asteroid belt and survive, only to doom ourselves with inaction. Illogical.
